name: Five Night's At Squarebear's 1
description:
Robots are now the entertainment of the future! Welcome to Squarebear's family of friends! You have just been hired as a security guard for a week to guard the pizzeria in case if anything suspicious goes on within the walls...

Click the bottom chevron-shaped button to open and close the cameras, as well as [A] and [D] to close either the left door or the right door.
